document.masterDocTitle: Catalogue of distribution of lizards (Reptilia: Squamata) from the Brazilian Amazonia. II. Gekkonidae, Phyllodactylidae, Sphaerodactylidae

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Catalogue of distribution of lizards (Reptilia: Squamata) from the Brazilian Amazonia. II. Gekkonidae, Phyllodactylidae, Sphaerodactylidae

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type-locality. West-Indies, restricted by
Smith & Taylor ( 1950 )
to Chichén Itzá, Mexico , and changed to Paramaribo, Suriname , by
Hoogmoed ( 1973 )
.
